title: Root settings data scheme
description: A data scheme for describing the root settings of the middleware, such as the URL it should be hosted on

port.description: The port on which the HTTP Server is listening for incoming requests

incomingWebID.description: The WebID to which requests will be sent, e.g. https://proxy.geens.cloud/profile/card#me

forwardWebID.description: The URL to which requests should be forwarded, e.g. https://pod.geens.cloud/profile/card#me

privacyPreferences.description: Describes the privacy settings of the user, i.e. which privacy levels are requested

customFields.description: In this field, privacy levels can be mapped to specific data schemes, such that for more/less sensitive schemes a privacy level can be chosen that differs from the default
